Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI gives us a ready made answer after comparing with multiple data sets on the internet but I feel with a teacher it is a more personal experience which also gives us the opportunity to be able to ask better questions and get clarifications on where we can improve

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Not so good but not so bad in both ways. I feel like I am my worse critic so I take both the same way

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: None that I can think of
